channel.title: Testimonials
channel.description: If you feel like sharing your experience with Pixel Exit products please feel free to share it in here!

item.title: Thanks to PixelExit
item.author: invalid@example.com (bosss)
item.dc:creator: bosss
item.content:encoded:
Thank You for excellent and great support.

Soon will buy one style more.

regards and thanks

bosss

item.title: Flat Awesome + should be named....
item.author: invalid@example.com (Welder)
item.dc:creator: Welder
item.content:encoded:
Hello Everyone,

I recently purchased the theme Flat Awesome + right here at pixelexit.com and I could not be more happier. Instead of calling it Flat Awesome +, it should be called Flat Awesome A+. Because this theme is of A+ quality.

I have to admit that I was a little sceptical about this theme prior to purchasing it, because I did not think it would offer what I needed as far as features, style options, functions, etc... but boy was I surprised. After installing it and spending the last...

Flat Awesome + should be named....

item.title: Huge thanks to PixelExit for my custom themes!
item.author: invalid@example.com (kaieivindm)
item.dc:creator: kaieivindm
item.content:encoded:
It's over two years ago since I first got in contact With Russ and Steve regarding Development of a custom theme for my Norwegian gaming forum.

I am very satisfied by the work that has been delivered to me. So back in January/February I ordered my second custom theme.

Version 1 - 2014
View attachment 4600
View attachment 4603
Version 2 - 2016
View attachment 4601
View attachment 4602
Version 2 included a logo as well and possibility to change colors, blue, green and...

Huge thanks to PixelExit for my custom themes!

item.title: Finally Flat Awesome (free) > Flat Awesome+ Migration
item.author: invalid@example.com (eva2000)
item.dc:creator: eva2000
item.content:encoded:
@Russ @Steve thanks for the awesome work put into FA+. I purchased FA+ back in November last year but only found the time to deploy today - migrating from FA (free) to FA+.

So far so good https://community.centminmod.com/

item.title: Pixel Exit is the only theme site I will use...
item.author: invalid@example.com (Shawn Gossman)
item.dc:creator: Shawn Gossman
item.content:encoded:
I've been running message forums for many years, nearly 20 years now. In my opinion, Pixel Exit is the best them designer I have ever seen. Their themes completely allow customization by those who use them and offer many ways to make them better. They do more with their themes with having custom footers and additional features to make the themes better as well.

I own the largest Skywarn Forum online which is powered by XenForo and I am proud to say that its theme is providing by Pixel Exit....

Pixel Exit is the only theme site I will use...

item.title: Best Support on web!!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Trevor dunlop)
item.dc:creator: Trevor dunlop
item.content:encoded:
I got style and had few Qs and i got reply and info i need as quick as i could ask for! Keep up the great work !!

Yazer TheGameHolics website owner

item.title: PixelExit = Last Stop
item.author: invalid@example.com (afrikaansprodigy)
item.dc:creator: afrikaansprodigy
item.content:encoded:
Let me first say that I have been a customer of vBulletin, IPB, and a few of the other forum software before. The companies I used for themes or modifications can not even touch the quality of PE. The quality is all across the board from the actual Styles themselves to the customer service. The responses are quick and helpful. Being new to this software, they are very helpful and friendly in making sure you understand what needs to be done and truly care about their customers. I will be...

PixelExit = Last Stop

item.title: Steve and Russ have been extremely nice to me
item.author: invalid@example.com (AlexK)
item.dc:creator: AlexK
item.content:encoded:
I am a new user of XF and Pixel Exit was my first choice for getting a custom style. I ended up choosing the Detour theme for customization as it is dark, minimalistic and would require the least amount of editing to fit to my niche. After a while of communication, @Steve began developing the theme. I really liked the sketch he first provided. From then on, the process, although slow, came to a finish after debugging and resolving the most tiny little frustrating issues with...

Steve and Russ have been extremely nice to me

item.title: Sorry. But I cannot resist.
item.author: invalid@example.com (Blast)
item.dc:creator: Blast
item.content:encoded:
Hello everyone, my name is Blast. I'm actually a new transfer to Xenforo. I've used other forum softwares before such as MyBB, IPB, vBulletin, etc. Anyways, to make this short and sweet, let's move on.

Purchasing anything from PixelExit is purchasing quality, reliability, and beauty. I have purchased FlatAwesome+ and it is just amazing. Now, what's even more amazing is this customer service provided by Russ. Oh man. This guy, does he even sleep? He replies faster than my girlfriend who just...

Sorry. But I cannot resist.

item.title: PixelExit is the way to go
item.author: invalid@example.com (Mark87)
item.dc:creator: Mark87
item.content:encoded:
I had been contemplating a new style for sometime and always dread dealing with designs because it has never worked out in the past. Steve and Russ are a joy to work with and my custom design is a dream. The support is second to none.

If your looking for a great style with support that will be there every step of the way than you found it !

Thank you PixelExit !

item.title: PixelExit = Dedicated, Honest and Tier 1 Quality
item.author: invalid@example.com (aquarium)
item.dc:creator: aquarium
item.content:encoded:
Happened to return to the forum to download an update. I've had the pleasure of working with Russ and the folks at the PixelExit team. The work done is unbeatable and anyone who sees our forums thinks they are among the most stunning and functional designs they have ever seen. While I would love to take all the credit it really goes to the team here. Case in point - how awesome the Xenbase system is, how often it is updated and how well it functions for the most part in all major browsers...

PixelExit = Dedicated, Honest and Tier 1 Quality

item.title: A PixelExit customer review
item.author: invalid@example.com (Redh)
item.dc:creator: Redh
item.content:encoded:
Hello - I wasn't sure where to post this, but I wanted to put it somewhere potential customers could access. Feel free to move it if appropriate!

I've been a customer of PixelExit for just under two weeks now, and last night I finally got around to relaunching my website and switching from vBulletin to Xenforo. I spent a lot of time choosing the right skin to use as the basis of my redesign, and I really wasn't familiar with the Xenforo options and template structure. I was also keen to...

A PixelExit customer review

item.title: Thanks for this work!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Dylan)
item.dc:creator: Dylan
item.content:encoded:
Hi,

I just wanted to thank Russ and Steve for having created this site and this superb work! I'm very happy with my purchase and thank you again! I've never seen better on XenForo.

item.title: A big thank you to Russ
item.author: invalid@example.com (ernestdefoe)
item.dc:creator: ernestdefoe
item.content:encoded:
I just wanted to post a message saying thank you to @Russ for updating an old custom theme I had him to make and update it to the newest version of xF and also enable it to use the Xenbase Framework. If anyone is looking for a custom theme from PixelExit make sure they include the XenBase Framework it makes it easy for non expert guys like me to edit things easily. When Russ first made the style it was alot of template changes and CSS and now it's all style properties and CSS...

A big thank you to Russ

item.title: Wanted to say thanks to Russ
item.author: invalid@example.com (ernestdefoe)
item.dc:creator: ernestdefoe
item.content:encoded:
I ordered a custom theme from Russ/PixelExit and I just have to say how pleased I am was with the overall process. Russ stayed in contact with me the whole time and was great doing business with him. While the theme isn't 100% yet (I know Russ will get it 100% soon) he did an amazing job on the theme. Already have had several people comment on how clean and amazing it looks. If you are looking for someone to make a custom theme for you I highly recommend Russ/PixelExit. They go above and...

Wanted to say thanks to Russ
